hours_text:
## HOURS + DIRECTIONS

* * *

**ADMISSION TO THE GALLERY IS ALWAYS FREE!**

**MONDAY** | Closed  
**TUESDAY** | 10 - 5 pm  
**WEDNESDAY** | 10 - 5 pm  
**THURSDAY** | 10 - 5 pm  
**FRIDAY** | 10 - 5 pm  
**SATURDAY** | 10 - 5 pm  
**SUNDAY** | Noon - 5 pm

# HOURS 

**SPECIAL HOLIDAY HOURS**

Thanksgiving | CLOSED Day after Thanksgiving | 12 - 5 pm Christmas Eve | 10 - 2 pm Christmas | CLOSED Day after Christmas | CLOSED New Year’s Eve | CLOSED New Year’s Day | CLOSED Easter | CLOSED

Our galleries undergo exhibition changeovers every few weeks to install new artwork and prepare for upcoming shows. During this time, access is limited to ensure safety and protect the work in progress. The Gallery Store remains open during this time. 

For Exhibition dates, head to our [**Exhibition Page**](/exhibitions)**.**

# MAP + DIRECTIONS

Located in downtown Everett, Schack Art Center is easily accessible by bicycle, car and public transportation. 

**2921 Hoyt Avenue  
Everett, WA 98201**

Street parking is free in downtown Everett with a 90-minute limit. After 6pm and on weekends, street parking is free with no restrictions. 

[Everpark Garage](https://downtowneverettwa.org/everpark-garage/) is one block north of Schack Art Center at 2815 Hoyt Avenue. Parking is $1 per hour.

## PARKING

admission_text:
## BECOME A MEMBER TODAY!

**Schack Art Center members provide essential support for keeping art and culture accessible for everyone and at the very heart of community life.**

## A NEW SEASON OF BENEFITS!

### Beginning December 1, Patron Memberships offer even more ways to experience Schack Art Center!

**PATRON MEMBERSHIP BENEFITS | $200**

  * **10% off Classes and Workshops**

  * **10% off Exhibition and Gallery Store purchases**

  * **Admission and Discounts at NARM Institutions in North America (Learn more about NARM below)**

  * **Early Access to Summer Camps**

  * **2 Tickets to our Garden Party**

  * **1 Complimentary Drink at Exhibition Openings**

## CHOOSE A MEMBERSHIP

* * *

### FRIEND MEMBERSHIP | $100

  * Free admission to all exhibitions

  * Free admission to all exhibitions

  * Discounted rates on Classes and Workshops

**PLUS**

  * **Early Access to Summer Camps**

  * **2 Tickets to our Garden Party**

  * **1 Complimentary Drink at Exhibition Openings**

collections_text:
* ## H'ARTS BENEFIT AUCTION

**MARCH 7 | 5-9pm**

Tickets On Sale Now — H’Arts Benefit Auction + Gala!

Support arts education and free exhibitions at Schack Art Center. Join us in person for an unforgettable evening of art, music, raffles, a hosted bar, and delicious food.

[ BOOK YOUR SEATS ](https://www.zeffy.com/en-US/ticketing/44th-annual-harts-benefit-auction)

  * ## EXCELLENCE IN FIBERS X

**JANUARY 15 - FEBRUARY 14, 2026**

**Opening Reception | January 15 | 5-8pm**

This  _Excellence In Fibers_ is a 10th anniversary exhibition, bringing the best of current international fiber and textiles to a growing global fiber art community. Artists are encouraged to push the boundaries in the areas of installations, sculpture, vessels, wall/floor works, and wearable art.

Valerie Maser Flanagan, _Up the Rabbit Hole #6_

[ LEARN MORE ](/excellence-in-fibers)

  * ## CALL FOR ART

Show your work, grow your audience, and connect with a vibrant community of artists and art lovers! We host juried and invitational exhibitions throughout the year, highlighting both emerging and established voices.

[ LEARN MORE ](/get-involved)

  * ## BECOME A MEMBER!

Beginning December 1, Patron Memberships offer even more ways to experience Schack Art Center. Enjoy expanded discounts, exciting giveaways, special access, event tickets, and more—because being a member should feel special.

[ LEARN MORE ](/become-a-member)
